text: Juan Carlos Taibo Lopez (born January 8, 1978 in A Coruña) is a 7-per-team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he has cerebral palsy and is a C8 type player. He played 7-per-team football at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played the United States and won 2-1. == References == Category:Spanish footballers Category:Living people Category:1978 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from A Coruña Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type C8
title: Juan Carlos Taibo Lopez
